channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Matrix Reloaded Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Matrix Reloaded Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34788|2024-08-03T09:22:10.169Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20reloaded%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Matrix Reloaded Plugin 1.1.3 and earlier does not escape the agent name in tooltips, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Agent/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-34789|2024-08-03T09:22:10.633Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20reloaded%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Matrix Reloaded Plugin 1.1.3 and earlier allows attackers to rebuild previous matrix builds.
